catalog_info.title: Poverty and Development
catalog_info.prereq: Course open to Freshman Students Only
catalog_info.description: We will consider a number of important questions in the field of development economics: Why are some countries so rich and others so poor? What factors have determined which countries prosper? Can these factors be changed with specific economic policies? If so, what are they and how are they best implemented? Are there country-specific characteristics that determine economic fate? Or, is prosperity just the result of luck?  Does the enjoyment of the rich somehow depend on the continuing suffering of the poor?
